Literature.Title: Effects of single amino acid substitution on the biophysical properties and biological activities of an amphipathic ?-helical antibacterial peptide against Gram-negative bacteria.
Literature.Author: Tan J, Huang J, Huang Y, Chen Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=125µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=125µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H188(MIC=64µg/ml)
